name: Artionet
overview:
The name Artionet was found by combining the words “artâ€ and “Internet”. The idea comes from Yannick Guerdat. HOME-MADE SOFTWARE:

E-Commerce (ArtioCommerce). CMS (IceCube.Net). NewsLetters (IceCube.Net) Online and offline surveys (ArtioSurvey) Customer Relationship Management (ArtioCRM) NOW:

Artionet handles more than 1000 websites of small and medium companies, industries and important Groups in Switzerland.

OUR CONCEPT:

To offer CMS to important companies or small and medium companies.

To marry professional design to the technological know-how of the web.

To offer global services concepts related to the Internet:

The Marketing Mix (Product, Price, Advertising, and Distribution) of a company thanks to new vectors and interactive media.

E-Marketing

Consulting: advice, help, analyze

OUR OBJECTIVES:

To ensure the quality of our services and products.

To invest our selves for the satisfaction of the customers

To always manage/control Internet technologies at the best level.

OUR STRENGTHS:

Service which goes beyond our customers’ expectations.

Respect of the bill of specifications

A young motivated team with excellent skills.
